--- select_singer_with_where_and_op.sql
SELECT
  *
FROM
  Singers
WHERE
  SingerID = 1 OR FirstName = "foobar" AND LastName = "fizzbuzz"

--- AST
&parser.QueryStatement{
  Hint: (*parser.Hint)(nil),
  Expr: &parser.Select{
    pos:      0,
    end:      96,
    Distinct: false,
    AsStruct: false,
    List:     parser.SelectExprList{
      &parser.SelectExpr{
        pos:  9,
        end:  10,
        Expr: nil,
        Star: true,
        As:   (*parser.Ident)(nil),
      },
    },
    From: parser.FromItemList{
      &parser.FromItem{
        end:  25,
        Expr: &parser.TableName{
          end:   25,
          Ident: &parser.Ident{
            pos:  18,
            end:  25,
            Name: "Singers",
          },
          Hint: (*parser.Hint)(nil),
          As:   (*parser.Ident)(nil),
        },
        Method: "",
        Num:    nil,
        Rows:   false,
      },
    },
    Where: &parser.BinaryExpr{
      Op:   "AND",
      Left: &parser.BinaryExpr{
        Op:   "OR",
        Left: &parser.BinaryExpr{
          Op:   "=",
          Left: &parser.Ident{
            pos:  34,
            end:  42,
            Name: "SingerID",
          },
          Right: &parser.IntLit{
            pos:   45,
            end:   46,
            Value: "1",
          },
        },
        Right: &parser.BinaryExpr{
          Op:   "=",
          Left: &parser.Ident{
            pos:  50,
            end:  59,
            Name: "FirstName",
          },
          Right: &parser.StringLit{
            pos:   62,
            end:   70,
            Value: "foobar",
          },
        },
      },
      Right: &parser.BinaryExpr{
        Op:   "=",
        Left: &parser.Ident{
          pos:  75,
          end:  83,
          Name: "LastName",
        },
        Right: &parser.StringLit{
          pos:   86,
          end:   96,
          Value: "fizzbuzz",
        },
      },
    },
    GroupBy: parser.ExprList{},
    Having:  nil,
    OrderBy: parser.OrderExprList{},
    Limit:   (*parser.Limit)(nil),
  },
}

--- SQL
SELECT * FROM Singers WHERE SingerID = 1 OR FirstName = "foobar" AND LastName = "fizzbuzz"
